description: This file defines a frontend-only learner progress store that persists data to localStorage. It manages user-specific learning state, including course progress, tasks, activity logs, certificates, and skills gained. It provides functions to update and retrieve this state, as well as compute metrics like most recent course and readiness score.

methods.name: getStorageKey
methods.description: Generates a storage key based on the current user's email or a default key if no user is logged in.

methods.name: loadState
methods.description: Loads the learner progress state from localStorage, falling back to default state if unavailable.

methods.name: saveState
methods.description: Saves the current learner progress state to localStorage.
